results.name: Irregular triangle (read by rows) of coefficients T(n,k) of polynomials p(n,x) = Sum_{k=0..2*n} T(n,k) * x^k = (-1)^n * e^(x^3/3) * (((d/dx)^n) e^(-x^3/3)) for n >= 0 and 0 <= k <= 2*n.
comment: Let r(s;n,x) = Sum_{k=0..s*n} A(s;n,k)*x^k = (-1)^n * e^(x^(s+1)/(s+1)) * (((d/dx)^n) e^(-x^(s+1)/(s+1))) for n >= 0 and x complex and some fixed integer s >= 1. Special cases: A(1;n,k) = A066325(n,k) and A(2;n,k) is this triangle. Formula: A(s;n,k) = (Sum_{i=0..floor(k/(s+1))} (-1)^i * binomial((n+k) /(s+1),i) * binomial(n+k-(s+1)*i,n)) * (-1)^(n-(n+k)/(s+1)) * (n!) / ((s+1)^((n+k)/(s+1)) * (((n+k)/(s+1))!)) if (n+k) mod (s+1) = 0 else 0 with n >= 0 and 0 <= k <= s*n.
(2) r(s;n,x) = x^s * r(s;n-1,x) - ((d/dx) r(s;n-1,x)) for n > 0 with initial values A(s;0,0) = 1 = r(s;0,x) and A(s;n,k) = 0 if k < 0 or k > s*n or (n+k) mod (s+1) > 0;
This generalization is result of a long and intensive discussion with Wolfdieter Lang. For more information see A091752.
formula: T(n,k) = (-1)^k * (n!) * (Sum_{i=0..floor(k/3)} (-1)^i * binomial((n+k) /3,i) * binomial(n+k-3*i,n)) / (3^((n+k)/3) * ((n+k)/3)!) if (n+k) mod 3 = 0 else 0 with n >= 0 and 0 <= k <= 2*n.
(6) (d/dx) p(n,x) = 2*n*x*p(n-1,x) - n*(n-1)*p(n-2,x) for n > 0 with initial values T(0,0) = 1 = p(0,x) and T(n,k) = 0 if k < 0 or k > 2*n or (n+k) mod 3 > 0.

The polynomials p(n,x) satisfy for n >= 0 and x complex the differential equation: 0 = (((d/dx)^3) p(n,x)) - 2*x^2*(((d/dx)^2) p(n,x)) + (x^4 + 2*(n-1)*x) * ((d/dx) p(n,x)) - (2*n*x^3-(n+3)*n) * p(n,x).
((d/dx)^m) p(n,x) = Sum_{i=0..m} (-1)^i * binomial(m,i) * p(m-i,-x) * p(n+i,x) for m,n >= 0 and x complex.
